survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station Networks Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with the availability, functionality, and user experience of public electric vehicle charging stations.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?
answer_options: Running low on battery while out
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button for single-choice selection with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using public EV charging stations?
answer_options: Running low on battery while out

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox for multi-choice selection with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
